<js>
var url=[];
a=@get:{number};
a=a/20+1;
url[0]=baseUrl+"?page=2";
url[1]=baseUrl+"?page=3";
if(a>3)
  for (i=4;i<=a;i++)
    url[i-2]=baseUrl+"?page="+i;
url;
</js>

<js>
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var og = (selector) =>
  J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content');

var book = {
  name: og('novel:book_name'),

  latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name') + ' ' + String(og('novel:update_time')).replace(/(\d+-\d+-\d+).*/, '$1').replace(new RegExp('(Â·s*)?([^\\d-])?(\\d{2})?'+String(new Date().getFullYear()).slice(-2)+'-'),'$1$2'),
  cover: og('image'),
  intro: String(J.select('#all').html()).replace('[æ”¶èµ·]', ''),
  url: String(baseUrl).replace(/[^\/\d]+((\d+)\d{3})\..*/, '$2/$1/')
};

book;
</js>

};

book;
</js>

      wordCount: o('.layui-bg-red').replace(/\s+ä¸‡å­—/,'ä¸‡'),

      latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/[\(ï¼ˆã€].*[æ±‚æ›´è°¢ä¹å‘æ¨].*/,''), 

      intro: 'ã€€ã€€æœ€è¿‘æ›´æ–°:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/,' ').replace(/\//g,'-') + '\n' + o('.intro p:eq(0)').replace(/.*(è§‚çœ‹å°è¯´:|ç®€ä»‹ï¼š)|å„ä½ä¹¦å‹.*/,'').replace(/\s+/g,'\n'),

};

book;
</js>
